short_summary: Supply of liquid gases, gas cylinders and custom gas mixtures
description: Supply of liquid gases, gas cylinders and custom gas mixtures for chemistry laboratories of The Analysis and Air Quality Section with Environment and Climate Changes Canada.
full_summary:
-----------------

### Official Government Tender Announcement

**Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Supply of Liquid Gases, Gas Cylinders, and Custom Gas Mixtures**

**Reference Number:** WS4380869564
**Solicitation Number:** WS4380869564
**Publication Date:** January 4, 2024
**Closing Date:** February 21, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Project Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking proposals for the supply of liquid gases, gas cylinders, and custom gas mixtures for use in chemistry laboratories of The Analysis and Air Quality Section.

**Scope:**
The scope of work includes the supply of various types of liquid gases, gas cylinders, and custom gas mixtures. Interested contractors must have experience in providing similar services to government or public sector clients.

**Delivery:**
Tenders are to be delivered to the Contracting Entity, either electronically or in hard copy, to the address listed above.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Status:** Expired

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries related to this tender, please contact Nicole Zimmerling, provided contact details listed in the attachment.

**Professional Requirements:**
Bidders must have a general business license, Certificates of competence for the contracted services and proof of insurance. Licensees must abide by applicable laws and regulations.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender solicitation is open to contractors based in Canada that are participating in a trade agreement with the Government of Canada.
